content: warm and cozy this colorful throw knit in woolstok tweed aran is perfect for a chilly day pick five colors to make this must-have throw for your home experience level * advanced beginner materials * woolstok tweed aran 85% highland wool 15% donegal 100g/109yds 6 hanks a 2 hanks b 2 hanks c 2 hanks d 2 hanks e & optional fringe 3 hanks a * tapestry needle finished measurements * height 60½ without fringe * width 48 color shown * rolled oats no 3300 a * deep earth no 3309 b * sage rose no 3312 c * plum brandy no 3311 d * tiger lilly no 3313 e
